name: DeploySsas
description: Deploy SQL Server Analysis Services Project .xmla file using Invoke-ASCmd
author: avdbrink

inputs.name: PartitionDeployment
inputs.label: Partition deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Deploy partitions: Any existing partition will be replaced
Retain partitions: Partitions for new measure groups will be deployed, but partitions for existing measure groups will be unaffected

inputs.name: RoleDeployment
inputs.label: Role deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Deploy roles and members: Any existing roles and members will be replaced
Deploy roles and retain members: Roles will be deployed along with their members for new roles. Members for existing roles will be retained.
Retain roles and members: The roles ands members will not be deployed

inputs.name: ProcessingOption
inputs.label: Processing option
inputs.helpMarkDown: NOTE: deploying a model with Compatibility mode 2016 and processing option set to Default or Full will generate an invalid deployment (json) file. Select None if you want compatibility level 1200 or higher.

inputs.name: ConfigurationSettingsDeployment
inputs.label: Retain configuration settings for existing objects

inputs.name: OptimizationSettingsDeployment
inputs.label: Retain optimization settings for existing objects

inputs.name: ImpersonationInformation
inputs.label: Select an impersonation option

options.UseASpecificWindowsUser: Use a specfic Windows user and password
options.UseTheCredentialsOfTheCurrentUser: Use the credentials of the current user

inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select an impersonation option:
'Do not change anything' will skip the impersonation of the database.
'Use a specfic Windows user and password' will show input field to specify the username and password (this is the recommended impersonation)
'Use the service account' changes the impersonation to use the service account (not recommended)
'Use the credentials of the current user' uses the credentials of the user connecting to the database (not recommended)

inputs.name: ServiceAccountPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use a secret variable for the password, values here are stored unsecure.

inputs.name: WriteBackTableCreation
inputs.label: Writeback Table Options
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Create: Create a new writeback table, if one does not exist. If a writeback table already exists, an error occurs.
CreateAlways: Create a new writeback table, overwriting any existing writeback table.
Use Existing: Use the existing writeback table, if one already exists. If one does not exist, an error occurs.

inputs.name: mgmtVersion
inputs.label: Management Studio Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select Management Studio version on TFS Agent machines. Appropriate version of SQL Management Studio must be installed on agent!

inputs.name: customMGMTVersion
inputs.label: Custom Analysis Services Deployment executable path

messages.ProcessingDatabase0: Processing the database with processing option {0} ...
messages.ErrorDuringDeployment: Error(s) occurred while deploying database! See above error codes for details
messages.ErrorDuringProcessing: Error(s) occurred while processing database! See above error codes for details
messages.CompilerNotFound: No compiler could be found! Do you have SQL Server Management Studio installed on your agent?
